snippet.title: Life & Death (PC/DOS) 1988, The Software Toolworks
snippet.description:
Successful appendix removal surgery! 
--
To shortly resume Life & Death (also known as Life and Death: You are the Surgeon!), it's about simulation and . It was done by Software Toolworks, Inc., in the 1988 

Diagnose patients correctly and perform increasingly difficult more advanced procedures to get promoted. The games are much celebrated for their strong emphasis on realism (not surprisingly, since their designer is a real doctor). The games also boast high educational value as well, since every time you make mistakes you'll be sent to a classroom to learn what you do wrong?

Feel free to download and try it!
http://www.myabandonware.com/game/life-death-h6#download

"Warning! Viewer Discretion Is Advised - Starts to get very graphic beyond 7:00 point"
